# Scintillating Sphere (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Electricity Spells|electricity]]]

**Level: [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]]**, [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a glass marble and a pinch of iron oxide)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius spread

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Magic of Faerun (WotC), pg. 115

As *[[Fireball (Spell)|fireball]]*, except as noted above and that the spell deals electricity damage.
